StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Experienced Backend / Full Stack Developer with a demonstrated history of working in IT & services industry. Skilled in developing micro-services using Java, JavaScript, MongoDB, Oracle SQL, Hibernate & REST/SOAP Web Services. Certified in Oracle 10g Forms & Java Enterprise Edition using Hibernate Framework (Globsyn Business School). Certified as Microsoft Technology Associate in both Database Fundamentals & C#.

PositionHistory.Title: Full-Stack Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
TRM - Talent Relationship Management (Integration): As a Full-Stack Developer, I worked mainly on developing micro -services using JAVA EE at the back-end and javascript / jQuery at client side for building efficient and reusable front-end systems thereby developing Career Sites for a number of clients having integration with ATS like Workday, ADP, Succesfactors, Taleo, CSOD, Compass etc. The role was to develop, maintain as well as support the product for different clients and fix issues on the go. At the storage / database side, we use mongo-db for storing all details related to candidates or client's configurations, and REDIS for storing HTML forms using caching mechanisms for faster retrieval. Technology used: Java-8, Javascript, jQuery, MongoDB, REDIS, Node.js, Kafka for events
Tools: Eclipse, Jenkins, BitBucket, SOAP UI, Studio 3T (Mongo DB), Docker, SonarCube OS: Linux Environment (v16+)

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 76% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Systems Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Training - Trained in Python with OOPs and Data Structure & Java Enterprise Edition (J2EE) using Hibernate Framework (includes JSF and Servlets). Project Experience - Worked on Bonita BPM tool at Client location (Verizon Data Services Limited). The tool was used to develop processes/flows based on user's requirement. It allows the user to graphically modify business processes following the BPMN standard. The user can also connect processes to other pieces of the information system. The BPM engine is a Java application that executes process definitions created with Bonita Studio
• Understand the business requirements and develop processes/flows (Bonita Studio). • Manage both front end and back end part of processes/flows. (UI Designer, Oracle SQL, JavaScript, Angular). • Monitor logs and Bonita Stability. Fix issues and bugs on the ongoing processes/flows. • Develop web services to support Bonita on calling other piece of system - (REST/SOAP)

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 77% of this job

Degree.Comments:
Heritage Institute of Technology, Kolkata, West Bengal Bachelor of Technology, Graduated June 2015 Graduated from Computer Science & Engineering with 8.4 CGPA.
Kendriya Vidyalaya Fort William, Kolkata, West Bengal

Secondary School, XII Standard, May 2011 Secured 91.2% (Science with Computer Science as additional subject).
Kendriya Vidyalaya Fort William, Kolkata, West Bengal
Primary School, X Standard, May 2009 Secured 91.4%

LicenseOrCertification.Name: Certified as Microsoft Technology Associate in both Database Fundamentals

Qualifications.QualificationSummary:
Professional Skills
Primary Skills: Java - J2EE with Hibernate / Spring MVC & Servlets, Javascript, jQuery, MongoDB, Node.js, Web Services - REST/SOAP, Oracle SQL, HTML5/CSS3.
Secondary Skills: Basic Understanding of Angular, Kafka, REDIS & Docker.
Tools / IDE: Eclipse, SOAP UI, Jenkins, BitBucket / Stash, Studio 3T (MongoDB), Postman (API), Git
OS: Linux (v16), Macintosh, Windows.

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
HIMANSHU KUMAR SINGH Address | Aditya Heights, Shilpa Park, Kondapur, Hyderabad 500084 Contact | +91-7331101400 Email @ | himanshus345@gmail.com
Summary Experienced Backend / Full Stack Developer with a demonstrated history of working in IT & services industry. Skilled in developing micro-services using Java, JavaScript, MongoDB, Oracle SQL, Hibernate & REST/SOAP Web Services. Certified in Oracle 10g Forms & Java Enterprise Edition using Hibernate Framework (Globsyn Business School). Certified as Microsoft Technology Associate in both Database Fundamentals & C#.
Education Heritage Institute of Technology, Kolkata, West Bengal Bachelor of Technology, Graduated June 2015 Graduated from Computer Science & Engineering with 8.4 CGPA.
Kendriya Vidyalaya Fort William, Kolkata, West Bengal Secondary School, XII Standard, May 2011 Secured 91.2% (Science with Computer Science as additional subject).
Kendriya Vidyalaya Fort William, Kolkata, West Bengal Primary School, X Standard, May 2009 Secured 91.4%
Employment History ➢ Phenom People, Hyderabad, Telangana, Full-Stack Developer (Feb 2018 - Till Date)
TRM - Talent Relationship Management (Integration): As a Full-Stack Developer, I worked mainly on developing micro -services using JAVA EE at the back-end and javascript / jQuery at client side for building efficient and reusable front-end systems thereby developing Career Sites for a number of clients having integration with ATS like Workday, ADP, Succesfactors, Taleo, CSOD, Compass etc. The role was to develop, maintain as well as support the product for different clients and fix issues on the go. At the storage / database side, we use mongo-db for storing all details related to candidates or client's configurations, and REDIS for storing HTML forms using caching mechanisms for faster retrieval. Technology used: Java-8, Javascript, jQuery, MongoDB, REDIS, Node.js, Kafka for events
Tools: Eclipse, Jenkins, BitBucket, SOAP UI, Studio 3T (Mongo DB), Docker, SonarCube OS: Linux Environment (v16+)
➢ Infosys, Hyderabad, Telangana, (Senior) Systems Engineer (July 2015 - Jan 2018)
Training - Trained in Python with OOPs and Data Structure & Java Enterprise Edition (J2EE) using Hibernate Framework (includes JSF and Servlets). Project Experience - Worked on Bonita BPM tool at Client location (Verizon Data Services Limited). The tool was used to develop processes/flows based on user's requirement. It allows the user to graphically modify business processes following the BPMN standard. The user can also connect processes to other pieces of the information system. The BPM engine is a Java application that executes process definitions created with Bonita Studio
• Understand the business requirements and develop processes/flows (Bonita Studio). • Manage both front end and back end part of processes/flows. (UI Designer, Oracle SQL, JavaScript, Angular). • Monitor logs and Bonita Stability. Fix issues and bugs on the ongoing processes/flows. • Develop web services to support Bonita on calling other piece of system - (REST/SOAP)
Hobbies & Interests 1. Big fan of Game of Thrones 2. Love Watching American tv-series
3. Adventure / Travelling 4. Coding - I like to automate things
Professional Skills
Primary Skills: Java - J2EE with Hibernate / Spring MVC & Servlets, Javascript, jQuery, MongoDB, Node.js, Web Services - REST/SOAP, Oracle SQL, HTML5/CSS3.
Secondary Skills: Basic Understanding of Angular, Kafka, REDIS & Docker.
Tools / IDE: Eclipse, SOAP UI, Jenkins, BitBucket / Stash, Studio 3T (MongoDB), Postman (API), Git
OS: Linux (v16), Macintosh, Windows.
Languages
English, Hindi

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: HIMANSHU KUMAR SINGH's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Java) and slightly concentrated in User Experience (mostly Information Architect). HIMANSHU KUMAR SINGH's experience appears to be lower-to-mid level, with about 4 years of experience.
